Text: Comprehensive Planning RFP SubmittalsStaff has received the following RFP documents Civic Design Wilbur Smith Associates Vernon G Henry and Associates I will be leaving you a copy of the RFP at your house this evening As three days is required for public posting staff would like to schedule a meeting of members to review and score the written proposals Would you be available on May or A budget workshop with council is scheduled for May Interviews are scheduled for May Please advise staff as to these available dates for you I would be more than happy to email the other members based upon your comments dnm
